fulltext:
OBJECTIVE 
My goal Is to become a good Project Manager in an international company and 
earn more success with this title. 
OVER VIEW 
- 
More than 6 years in software development with the first 2 years as a 
developer. I have more than 4 years worked as Project Team leader and 
Project Manager.  
- 
Experience in working with foreigner clients from Australia, UK, US and 
Singapore. 
- 
Lead variety projects to success by applying Scrum methodology. 
- 
Through many phases of software development such as getting 
requirement, design, development, enhancement and maintenance. 
- 
Experience with human management.  
TECHNICAL SKILL 
- 
Programming languages and database knowledge: 
o 
Experienced with C#, VB.Net and ASP.Net web form and MVC 
3,4,5, Web API 
o 
Experienced with SQL Server, My SQL. 
o 
LINQ, Function programming 
o 
HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap framework 
o 
Jquery, AngularJS, KnockoutJS, ReactJS 
o 
Fluent with GIT and GIT FLOW concept. 
MANAGEMENT SKILL 
o 
Project Management 
o 
Fluent with SCRUM, KANBAN 
o 
Experienced with CMMI 
o 
Human Resource Management 
o 
Worked with foreign clients (Singaporean, British, American, 
Australian).  
EXPERIENCE 
From June 2018 – Now 
TPS Software Company 
Project Manager – Business Unit Manager 
Duties: Responsibility of managing projects from Singapore and UK market.  
Build and run to market service GorillaSpace, the top 5 product for real estate of 
Singapore in 2018. Using .Net technology  
Chung  
Pham Minh 
>
Project Manager 
>
Project Team Leader 
>
Application Owner 
Address: 235/62/12 Nam Ky Khoi 
Nghia, Ward 7, District 3 
Cell Phone: 0933 098 958 
Email: minhchung489@gmail.com 
Page 2 
Human resource management. In charge of deal salary, recruit suitable 
members for dedicated project.  
Experience with project management tools: Jira, Trello, Pivotal tracker. 
Create a report system.  
Built a development process for each project based on Agile and Kanban 
methodologies. 
Deal with client about resource and budget. 
Developing 3 projects for UK market, release successfully a first phases.  
o 
Copronet: Instruction Project Management (php) 
o 
ThreatAware: System Monitoring. (React js, node js) 
o 
Ontrack: Retire consulting system. 
From Apr 2016 – March 2018 
Amaris Consulting Company 
Project Leader – Application Owner 
> Duties: Responsibility of developing financial application for managing budget.  
Integrate with ARP ERP system. Analyze functions and ensure release product 
backlog item on time with high quality. Manage team members, Project BA and 
Product Owner.  
Technologies used 
Backend: MVC5, SQL server 
Frontend: HTML5, CSS4, Bootstrap, Jquery, Ajax 
Using TFS to manage project progress. 
From Apr 2015 – Apr 2016 
Success Software Service 
Project Manager 
> Duties: Responsibility of managing project with process CMMI and SCRUM with 
high quality. Apply fully SCRUM to manage project team and progress, ensure 
always to release project sprint on time and make client be happy with the 
result.  
> Closed applications and projects descriptions: 
o 
ISelect (web portal with Jira API) 
o 
STORM (Australia Foot Ball management system) 
o 
Expressome (Mobile – application allows user upload images and 
conduct a contest to rate a favorite images) 
o 
Mail Daily (PHP web mail system – allows user to create 
campaigns and set scheduler to send) 
o 
Success HR management (PHP Web – manage all HR process of 
Success company) 
Page 3 
From Apr 2014 – Apr 2015 
TMA Solutions 
Senior Developer – team leader 
> Responsibility of developing functions for E-Housekeeping system, a very 
famous tool of FCS company and applied for Sheraton hotel series. Coding, 
managing team with tasks and training new member.  
Page 4 
From Oct 2012 – Apr 2014 
Adicom JSC 
Developer 
> Projects: 
o 
Management system for Maternity Hospitals (for governance) 
o 
E-Learning English 
o 
Smart Way 
o 
Ovis-Shepherd 
EDUCATION 
Degrees: 
o Bachelor of information system form Hung Vuong University in 2012  
o Designing website of NhatNghe center 
o Banking business certificate at Economic and Law university in 2011 
o Project Manager Certificate of Coursera 
REFERENCES 
Nguyen Tran Minh Tu – Governance AO of Amaris. 
Nguyen Duy Khuong – Project Team Leader of TPS
